00028 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session_check.inc.php';

00033 // privileges checking
00034 $can_read = utility::havePrivilege('bibliography', 'r');
00035 $can_write = utility::havePrivilege('bibliography', 'w');
00036 
00037 if (!$can_read) {
00038     die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('You are not authorized to view this section').'</div>');
00039 }

00041 if (!extension_loaded('yaz')) {
00042     die('<div class="errorBox">YAZ extension library is not loaded/installed yet. '
00043         .'YAZ library is needed to use z3950 enabled service. '
00044         .'Please refer to official <a href="http://www.php.net/manual/en/book.yaz.php" target="_blank">YAZ PHP Manual</a>'
00045         .' on how to setup/install YAZ extension library in PHP.</div>');

00048 $zserver[] = 'z3950.loc.gov:7090/voyager';

00050 /* RECORD OPERATION */
00051 if (isset($_POST['saveZ']) AND isset($_SESSION['z3950result'])) {
00055     function getAuthorID($str_author_name, $str_author_type, &$arr_cache = false)
00056     {
00057         global $dbs;
00058         $str_value = trim($str_author_name);
00059         if ($arr_cache) {
00060             if (isset($arr_cache[$str_value])) {
00061                 return $arr_cache[$str_value];
00062             }
00063         }
00064 
00065         $str_value = $dbs->escape_string($str_value);
00066         $id_q = $dbs->query('SELECT author_id FROM mst_author WHERE author_name=\''.$str_value.'\'');
00067         if ($id_q->num_rows > 0) {
00068             $id_d = $id_q->fetch_row();
00069             unset($id_q);
00070             // cache
00071             if ($arr_cache) { $arr_cache[$str_value] = $id_d[0]; }
00072             return $id_d[0];
00073         } else {
00074             $_curr_date = date('Y-m-d');
00075             // if not found then we insert it as new value
00076             $dbs->query('INSERT IGNORE INTO mst_author (author_name, authority_type, input_date, last_update)'
00077                 .' VALUES (\''.$str_value.'\', \''.$str_author_type.'\', \''.$_curr_date.'\', \''.$_curr_date.'\')');
00078             if (!$dbs->error) {
00079                 // cache
00080                 if ($arr_cache) { $arr_cache[$str_value] = $dbs->insert_id; }
00081                 return $dbs->insert_id;
00082             }
00083         }
00084     }
00085 
00086 
00090     function getSubjectID($str_subject, $str_subject_type, &$arr_cache = false)
00091     {
00092         global $dbs;
00093         $str_value = trim($str_subject);
00094         if ($arr_cache) {
00095             if (isset($arr_cache[$str_value])) {
00096                 return $arr_cache[$str_value];
00097             }
00098         }
00099 
00100         $str_value = $dbs->escape_string($str_value);
00101         $id_q = $dbs->query('SELECT topic_id FROM mst_topic WHERE topic=\''.$str_value.'\'');
00102         if ($id_q->num_rows > 0) {
00103             $id_d = $id_q->fetch_row();
00104             unset($id_q);
00105             // cache
00106             if ($arr_cache) { $arr_cache[$str_value] = $id_d[0]; }
00107             return $id_d[0];
00108         } else {
00109             $_curr_date = date('Y-m-d');
00110             // if not found then we insert it as new value
00111             $dbs->query('INSERT IGNORE INTO mst_topic (topic, topic_type, input_date, last_update)'
00112                 .' VALUES (\''.$str_value.'\', \''.$str_subject_type.'\', \''.$_curr_date.'\', \''.$_curr_date.'\')');
00113             if (!$dbs->error) {
00114                 // cache
00115                 if ($arr_cache) { $arr_cache[$str_value] = $dbs->insert_id; }
00116                 return $dbs->insert_id;
00117             } else {
00118                 echo $dbs->error;
00119             }
00120         }
00121     }

00123 
00124     $gmd_cache = array();
00125     $publ_cache = array();
00126     $place_cache = array();
00127     $lang_cache = array();
00128     $author_cache = array();
00129     $subject_cache = array();
00130     $input_date = date('Y-m-d H:i:s');
00131     // create dbop object
00132     $sql_op = new simbio_dbop($dbs);
00133     $r = 0;
00134     foreach ($_POST['zrecord'] as $rec_idx) {
00135         // get the record from session
00136         $biblio = $_SESSION['z3950result'][$rec_idx];
00137         // escape all string value
00138         foreach ($biblio as $field => $content) { if (is_string($content)) { $biblio[$field] = $dbs->escape_string($content); } }
00139         // gmd
00140         $biblio['gmd_id'] = utility::getID($dbs, 'mst_gmd', 'gmd_id', 'gmd_name', $biblio['gmd'], $gmd_cache);
00141         unset($biblio['gmd']);
00142         // publisher
00143         $biblio['publisher_id'] = utility::getID($dbs, 'mst_publisher', 'publisher_id', 'publisher_name', $biblio['publisher'], $publ_cache);
00144         unset($biblio['publisher']);
00145         // publish place
00146         $biblio['publish_place_id'] = utility::getID($dbs, 'mst_place', 'place_id', 'place_name', $biblio['publish_place'], $place_cache);
00147         unset($biblio['publish_place']);
00148         // language
00149         $biblio['language_id'] = utility::getID($dbs, 'mst_language', 'language_id', 'language_name', $biblio['language'], $lang_cache);
00150         unset($biblio['language']);
00151         // author primary
00152         $author_main = $biblio['author_main'];
00153         unset($biblio['author_main']);
00154         // authors additional
00155         $authors_add = $biblio['authors_add'];
00156         unset($biblio['authors_add']);
00157         // authors corporate body
00158         $authors_corp = $biblio['authors_corp'];
00159         unset($biblio['authors_corp']);
00160         // authors conference
00161         $authors_conf = $biblio['authors_conf'];
00162         unset($biblio['authors_conf']);
00163         // subject
00164         $subjects = $biblio['subjects'];
00165         unset($biblio['subjects']);
00166         // unset copies
00167         unset($biblio['copies']);
00168         $biblio['input_date'] = $input_date;
00169         $biblio['last_update'] = $input_date;
00170         // title
00171         $biblio['title'] = trim(substr_replace($biblio['title'], '', strpos($biblio['title'], '/')));
00172 
00173         // fot debugging purpose
00174         // var_dump($biblio);
00175         // die();
00176 
00177         // insert biblio data
00178         $sql_op->insert('biblio', $biblio);
00179         echo '<p>'.$sql_op->error.'</p><p>&nbsp;</p>';
00180         $biblio_id = $sql_op->insert_id;
00181         if ($biblio_id < 1) {
00182             continue;
00183         }
00184         // insert author
00185         if ($author_main) {
00186             // author
00187             $author_id = utility::getID($dbs, 'mst_author', 'author_id', 'author_name', $author_main, $author_cache);
00188             @$dbs->query("INSERT IGNORE INTO biblio_author (biblio_id, author_id, level) VALUES ($biblio_id, $author_id, 1)");
00189         }
00190         // insert additional personal name authors
00191         if ($authors_add) {
00192             $author_id = 0;
00193             $author_type = 'p';
00194             foreach ($authors_add as $add_author) {
00195                 $author_id = getAuthorID($add_author, $author_type, $author_cache);
00196                 @$dbs->query("INSERT IGNORE INTO biblio_author (biblio_id, author_id, level) VALUES ($biblio_id, $author_id, 1)");
00197             }
00198         }
00199         // insert corporate body authors
00200         if ($authors_corp) {
00201             $author_id = 0;
00202             $author_type = 'o';
00203             foreach ($authors_corp as $author_corp) {
00204                 $author_id = getAuthorID($author_corp, $author_type, $author_cache);
00205                 @$dbs->query("INSERT IGNORE INTO biblio_author (biblio_id, author_id, level) VALUES ($biblio_id, $author_id, 1)");
00206             }
00207         }
00208         // insert conference/meeting authors
00209         if ($authors_conf) {
00210             $author_id = 0;
00211             $author_type = 'c';
00212             foreach ($authors_conf as $author_conf) {
00213                 $author_id = getAuthorID($author_conf, $author_type, $author_cache);
00214                 @$dbs->query("INSERT IGNORE INTO biblio_author (biblio_id, author_id, level) VALUES ($biblio_id, $author_id, 1)");
00215             }
00216         }
00217         // insert subject/topical terms
00218         if ($subjects) {
00219             foreach ($subjects as $subject) {
00220                 $subject_type = 't';
00221                 $subject_id = getSubjectID($subject, $subject_type, $subject_cache);
00222                 @$dbs->query("INSERT IGNORE INTO biblio_topic (biblio_id, topic_id, level) VALUES ($biblio_id, $subject_id, 1)");
00223             }
00224         }
00225         if ($biblio_id) { $r++; }
00226     }
00227     // destroy result Z3950 session
00228     unset($_SESSION['z3950result']);
00229     utility::jsAlert($r.' records inserted to database.');
00230     echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.setContent(\'mainContent\', \''.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'\', \'get\');</script>';
00231     exit();
00232 }
00233 /* RECORD OPERATION END */
00234 
00235 /* SEARCH OPERATION */
00236 if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $can_read) {
00237     require LIB_DIR.'marcxmlsenayan.inc.php';
00238     $_SESSION['z3950result'] = array();
00239     $keywords = trim($_GET['keywords']);
00240     $num_hosts = count($zserver);
00241     $query = '';
00242     if ($keywords) {
00243         // parsing keywords and map query to RPN
00244         switch ($_GET['field']) {
00245             case 'ti' :
00246                 $query = '@or @and @attr 1=4 '.$keywords.' @and @attr 1=5 '.$keywords;
00247             break;
00248             case 'au' :
00249                 $query = '@attr 1=1 @and '.$keywords;
00250             break;
00251             default :
00252                 $query = '@or @attr 1=7 '.$keywords.' @attr 1=8 '.$keywords;
00253             break;
00254         }
00255 
00256         for ($h = 0; $h < $num_hosts; $h++) {
00257             $id[] = yaz_connect($zserver[$h]);
00258             yaz_syntax($id[$h], 'usmarc');
00259             yaz_range($id[$h], 1, 20);
00260             yaz_search($id[$h], 'rpn', $query);
00261         }
00262         yaz_wait();
00263         // preparing to buffer MARC XML result
00264         $errors = array();
00265         $hits = 0;
00266         ob_start();
00267         echo '<?xml version="1.0" standalone="yes"?>'."\n";
00268         echo '<collection xmlns="http://www.loc.gov/MARC21/slim">'."\n";
00269         for ($h = 0; $h < $num_hosts; $h++) {
00270             $error = yaz_error($id[$h]);
00271             if (!empty($error)) {
00272                 $errors[] = $error;
00273             } else {
00274                 // number of results
00275                 $hits = yaz_hits($id[$h]);
00276             }
00277             for ($rnum = 1; $rnum <= 20; $rnum++) {
00278                 $rec = yaz_record($id[$h], $rnum, 'xml; charset=marc-8,utf-8');
00279                 if (empty($rec)) continue;
00280                 echo $rec;
00281             }
00282         }
00283         echo '</collection>';
00284         $xml_result_string = ob_get_clean();
00285         // below is for debugging purpose
00286         // echo htmlentities($xml_result_string);
00287 
00288         if ($hits > 0) {
00289             echo '<div class="infoBox">Found '.$hits.' records from Z3950 Server, only 20 listed.</div>';
00290             // parse XML
00291             $xmlrec = marcXMLsenayan($xml_result_string);
00292             // save it to session vars for retrieving later
00293             $_SESSION['z3950result'] = $xmlrec;
00294             // create list and form
00295             echo '<form method="post" action="'.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'bibliography/z3950.php" target="blindSubmit">';
00296             echo '<table align="center" id="dataList" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0">';
00297             echo '<tr>';
00298             echo '<td colspan="3"><input type="submit" name="saveZ" value="Save Z3950 Records to Database" /></td>';
00299             echo '</tr>';
00300             // loop records
00301             $row = 1;
00302             foreach ($xmlrec as $rec_idx => $rec) {
00303                 $row_class = ($row%2 == 0)?'alterCell':'alterCell2';
00304                 echo '<tr>';
00305                 echo '<td width="1%" class="'.$row_class.'"><input type="checkbox" name="zrecord['.$rec_idx.']" value="'.$rec_idx.'" /></td>';
00306                 echo '<td width="80%" class="'.$row_class.'"><strong>'.$rec['title'].'</strong><div><i>'.$rec['author_main'].'</i></div></td>';
00307                 echo '<td width="19%" class="'.$row_class.'">'.$rec['isbn_issn'].'</td>';
00308                 echo '</tr>';
00309                 $row++;
00310             }
00311             echo '</table>';
00312             echo '</form>';
00313         } else if ($errors) {
00314             echo '<div class="errorBox"><ul>';
00315             foreach ($errors as $errmsg) {
00316                 echo '<li>'.$errmsg.'</li>';
00317             }
00318             echo '</ul></div>';
00319         } else {
00320             echo '<div class="errorBox">No Results Found!</div>';
00321         }
00322     } else {
00323         echo '<div class="errorBox">No Keywords Supplied!</div>';
00324     }
00325     exit();
00326 }
00327 /* SEARCH OPERATION END */
